Cannot update Alletra 6050 to 6.1.2.700
Hi,
we are facing the issue that we cannot download the newest firmware update for our Alletra 6050. Instead it is greyed out and hovering over it create a popup that says "2140_FW_Update".
We found this thread which shows a similar but not same behavior: https://community.hpe.com/t5/array-setup-and-networking/unable-to-download-update/m-p/7236862#M3671
The Alletra is currently on 6.1.1.300-1028597-opt.
What should we do to be able to upgrade?
1 REPLY 1
